name: Name
scan_gift_description: Visitors must register at KTO Booth first, do a mission scan QR barcodes after a consultation on 5 Seller Booth and get special merchandise from KTO.
lucky_draw_description: Visitors can get lucky draw ticket after consultation/ booking at Seller Booth and get a chance to win SQ Airlines tickets to Korea (round-trip).
instagram_challenge_description: Visitors can compete by take the documentation trough the highlight event on Instagram reels and mention @ktoid and get a chance to win Instax Camera.
kmtf_description: The Korean Medical Tourism Festival 2023 combines advanced healthcare offerings with South Korea's rich culture, attracting international visitors seeking top-notch medical care and cultural immersion. It features informative seminars, wellness activities, and historical tours, offering a holistic experience that blends modern medicine with traditional Korean hospitality.
kmte_description: "2023 KOREA MEDICAL TOURISM EXPO" which is a medical exhibition B2C located at Grand Atrium Pakuwon Mall Surabaya on 28th - 29th October 2023. This Event for general will provides information on medical and health, in order to increase the number of visitor arrivals in the future as well as expand and facilitate their spending while travelling in Korea. At this event, we will increase the reservation rate of inbound travel products and the number of inbound travel products.
make_candle_description: Experience a scent candle workshop learning how to make it by your own and bring it home.
claw_machine_description: Play claw machine and win special gifts. Also Capture your moments inside fun photobox.
talkshow_description: Talk show with the topic of the Wellness, Korea Medical Beauty, K-Make Over & Sharing Wow Korea Supporters 2023 Experience.
kmtm_description: Korean Medical Tourism Mart, offering services for beauty and health are featured at the Korea Medical Tourism Mart. Visitors have the chance to meet the seller 1-On-1 Business Meetings. If You are considering receiving medical attention or having cosmetic surgery in Korea.

b2b_questions.body: Have you had any experience in sending customers abroad for medical / beauty treatment?
Where do you usually send the customer?
Number of customer you have sent abroad for medical / beauty treatment? (for last 7 years)
What kind of of treatment you have sent abroad?
Why are you interested in attending this event?
Are you interested in developing package / making network / or sending customer to Korea for medical / beauty treatment?
What field of medical Korea are you interested in?
Do you have any target from this event?
Do you have any target segment for the package / network you will develop from this event?
What segment of customer is your main target?
(For travel agent) What kind of package is your main selling point?

kmte_warning: Please wait until 28 Oct 2023 for joining Korean Medical Tourism Expo
